Summary: Triangle like with bright white strobes.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Southwick
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsdriving south on routes 10\202 looked to the east and saw a large triangle shaped object with bright white stobes low in the sky moving slowly over the hill tops. i noticed it out of the corner of my eye due to the brightness of the strobes and, after that, its size. i stopped the car and turned around to try to get a better look but it had moved enough that i could not see it very well but, i could still see it. i could see that it was a solid object with strobes and it could have not been a plane due to its size, altitude and the fact that i could see it as a solid object shaped nothing like a plane. my 10 year old daughter was in the back seat and asked me "what the heck is that?! i calmly replied i guess a plane, not wanting to upset her. after the incident was over i asked her what it looked like to her she said "if i didn't know they weren't real i'd say a ufo." i said "oh i know, i'm sure it was a plane but what did it look like?" she said "a triangle". this is a fairly populated area, there must have been other sightings.
